description:
This is a market on whether the United States ambassador to Russia will be withdrawn from Russia by the government of the United States or expelled from Russia by the government of Russia between April 11, 2022 and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET. 

If the US ambassador to Russia is recalled from Russia by the government of the US, or expelled from Russia by the government of Russia, between April 11, 2022 and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Whether the ambassador resigns or not will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the U.S. Embassy and Consulates in Russia (https://ru.usembassy.gov/) as well as official information from the government of the United States including verified social media pages and/or official information from the government of the Russian Federation, however other credible reporting may be used.

For the purposes of resolving this market, an official announcement that an ambassador will be recalled or expelled within the timeframe of the market will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution.

markets.question: Will the USA ambassador be recalled or expelled from Russia before June 1, 2022?

title: Will the USA ambassador be recalled or expelled from Russia before June 1, 2022?
